titles.title: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta
気になってる人が男じゃなかった
The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

title: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta
title_english: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All
title_japanese: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった
synopsis:
The black-clad boy that Aya Oosawa likes is perfect: he is effortlessly nonchalant, has a sharp sense of style, and listens to the best music. Ever since the trendy Aya stumbled upon a small CD store to enjoy the rock classics her friends are not familiar with, the mysterious employee behind the counter has been on her mind. Meanwhile, the quiet and aloof Mitsuki Koga listens to her popular classmate Aya rave about her crush, tormented by a nagging thought: how to tell Aya that the guy she is interested in is not a guy at all!

In reality, when Mitsuki sheds her plain high school uniform, she is the one manning the counter at her uncle Joe's CD shop. She wrestles with how to reveal her identity, but flirting with the stunning and clueless Aya is just too tempting. As music becomes their shared passion, it seems that Aya's feelings will remain unchanged—even when Mitsuki's secret comes to light.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta began as a web comic released on the author's Twitter account since April 10, 2022, and published in print by Kadokawa since April 19, 2023. The series has been published in English as The Guy She Was Interested In Wasn't a Guy at All by Yen Press since October 22, 2024. It has also been released in Brazilian Portuguese by NewPOP Editora since June 20, 2024; in Polish by Waneko since June 28, 2024; in Italian by Edizioni Star Comics since July 9, 2024; and in Spanish by Panini Comics since November 28, 2024.
